item.title: Password Hash Cracking
item.description:
I’m taking a look how user-authentifications works.
We will dive a bit into hash functions
Finally, we try to recover passwords from leaked hashes using GPUs.
Addittionally, I’ll provide some complexity considerations as well as cost estimations.
